scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development TITLE='Timbercode DEV' BASE_PATH='' BASE_URL='http://localhost:3000' nodemon dev-server.js
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV='production' TITLE='Timbercode DEV' nuxt build
scripts.serve: cross-env NODE_ENV='production' TITLE='Timbercode DEV' node dev-server.js
scripts.preconfigure:aws: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production TITLE='Timbercode' BASE_PATH='' BASE_URL='https://testing.timbercode.pl' GA_TRACKING_ID='UA-89623087-2' nuxt build
scripts.configure:aws: claudia create --region ${AWS_REGION} --name timbercode-website --handler lambda.handler --deploy-proxy-api --runtime nodejs6.10 --memory 384 --timeout 5 --set-env-from-json env/testing.json
scripts.predeploy-testing: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production TITLE='Timbercode TST' BASE_PATH='' BASE_URL='https://testing.timbercode.pl' GA_TRACKING_ID='UA-89623087-2' DISQUS_SHORTNAME='timbercode-tst' GOOGLE_SITE_VERIFICATION_TAG_CONTENT='_vu81nMHx2GGG9Sq1XKWVYaSepJL7-bbXE3B_7Di1-U' nuxt build
scripts.predeploy-production: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production TITLE='Timbercode' BASE_PATH='' BASE_URL='https://timbercode.pl' GA_TRACKING_ID='UA-89623087-1' DISQUS_SHORTNAME='timbercode' GOOGLE_SITE_VERIFICATION_TAG_CONTENT='_vu81nMHx2GGG9Sq1XKWVYaSepJL7-bbXE3B_7Di1-U' nuxt build
